category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: CombinedAvailableAttributes
preference.preference_description: Defines the list of common Schedule and Schedule Task object attributes displayed in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a Program View is opened. Valid Values: Combined.object_desc - Displays object description in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. Combined.start_date - Displays start date in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. Combined.finish_date - Displays finish date in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. Combined.fnd0status - Displays status in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened. Combined.priority - Displays priority in the Column Chooser dialog box of the Schedule Manager application when a program view is opened.
